fileGenTask.description: Describes a file generation task, ie the evaluation of a velocity template. The velocity context of a generation task depends on the task. For fileGen tasks, this is the global context of the run. For node generation schemes, each task has additionally the NodeVBean under the "node" key.

templateFile.description: Path to a VTL template file, which contains the template

template.description: Text of the template, overrides 'templateFile' if specified

formatter.description: A formatter to apply as post-processing.

genClassName.description: Velocity template that evaluates to the fully qualified name of the generated Java file. This name determines the path where the generated class will be placed in the output root.

context.description: Additional bindings that will be added to the Velocity context of the template

vtl.description: A string that will be interpreted as a Velocity template

profile.description: A string ID to select a generation profile, used to filter applicable options.

vanillaJjtreeOpts.description: List of file generations corresponding to the gen:javacc task.

anyOf.description: If no value is present, the matching nodes will apply to the next set of generation tasks
Expands to the nodePackage + nodePrefix + name
Expands to nodePackage + name following the '%'. The difference is that the nodePrefix is not applied."
Qualified name (there is a dot in it), which is not expanded and taken as-is.

regexNodeMatcher.description: The part after the "r:" is interpreted as a regex. This pattern expands to all the nodes whose name match the regex.

templateNodeMatcher.description: The part after the "v:" is interpreted as a VTL template. It matches a node if it evaluates to true when evaluated against a node context.

anyOf.description: Selects the name of this node. This node won't have subtypes.

name.description: Selects the name of this node.

subtypes.description: Selects the direct subtypes of this node.

nodePrefix.description: Prefix prepended to the node name. Defaults to the JJTree key NODE_PREFIX, or its default of "AST"

nodePackage.description: Package of the node classes. Defaults to the JJTree key NODE_PACKAGE, or its default, the package of the parser.

trackTokens.description: If true, nodes will be provided with their first and last tokens using the node manipulator. Defaults to the JJTree key TRACK_TOKENS, or its default of false.

templateContext.description: Additional bindings for a Velocity context that will be shared by all template executions (gen:visitors, gen:nodes)

typeHierarchy.description: Description of the subtyping relation between generated node types. This is useful when your hierarchy is not trivial and you want to e.g. generate visitors with a delegation mechanism

nodeGen.description: Map of node selectors to node generation scheme. Each node of the grammar is matched against the selectors from top to bottom until a match is found. The matched selector specifies which file generation tasks are executed for this node. Those generation tasks will have the NodeVBean under the 'node' key.

commonGenExcludes.description: IDs of excluded tasks, perhaps inherited from the parent config file.

commonGen.description: Map of ids to file generation tasks. Those tasks will be executed with the global context of the run, i.e. with no specific NodeVBean
